definition: woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc
all good things must come to an end (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 xia4 mei2 you3 bu4 san4 de5 yan2 xi2

definition: tax on a banquet or feast

sentences.english: Marriage is a feast where the grace is sometimes better than the dinner.
sentences.chinese: 婚姻是场筵席，餐前祷告有时比饮宴本身要美好。

sentences.english: Also Vashti the queen made a feast for the women in the royal house which belonged to king Ahasuerus.
sentences.chinese: 王后瓦实提在亚哈随鲁王的宫内，也为妇女设摆筵席。

sentences.english: That day, oxen and horses were slaughtered for the feast.
sentences.chinese: 当日杀牛宰马，大张筵席。

sentences.english: Maundy Thursday served as a preparation for the feast of Easter about to follow.
sentences.chinese: 濯足日乃是为著紧接著到来之复活节筵席所做的预备。

sentences.english: Queen Vashti also gave a banquet for the women in the royal palace of King Xerxes.
sentences.chinese: 王后瓦实提在亚哈随鲁王的宫内也为妇女设摆筵席。

sentences.english: So Laban brought together all the people of the place and gave a feast.
sentences.chinese: 拉班就摆设筵席，请齐了那地方的众人。

sentences.english: After the feast the prince belched hugely.
They spoke against God, saying, 'Can God spread a table in the desert?
sentences.chinese: 并且妄论神，说，神在旷野岂能摆设筵席吗？

sentences.english: So the king and Haman came to banquet with Esther the queen.
sentences.chinese: 王带着哈曼来赴王后以斯帖的筵席。

sentences.english: Delicate banquet, return so that tableware foils .
sentences.chinese: 美味筵席，还得餐具衬托。

sentences.english: He prepared a meal for them, baking bread without yeast, and they ate.
sentences.chinese: 罗得为他们预备筵席，烤无酵饼，他们就吃了。

sentences.english: They foraged a pig for the feast.
sentences.chinese: 他们为筵席搞到一头猪。

sentences.english: Love Feast is worry, sorrow, feast and drunk.
sentences.chinese: 爱的筵席是心事，伤悲，筵席和一醉。

sentences.english: Love Feast is worry, sorrow, feast and drunk.
sentences.chinese: 爱的筵席是心事，伤悲，筵席和一醉。

sentences.english: But all good things must come to an end, as they say.
sentences.chinese: 但正如人们所说，天下没有不散的筵席。

sentences.english: While this was going on, Queen Vashti was giving a banquet for the officials' wives.
sentences.chinese: 在这期间，王后也为官员的夫人们摆设筵席。

definition: to entertain (for dinner)/to invite to dinner
food and drink/food to accompany wine
banquet where guests arrive at various times and are served with food as they arrive
